lender.name: Matt
lender.occupation: Student--Training for a MD and a JD
lender.loan_because: I believe entrepreneurialism is a powerful force for creating meaningful and sustainable change. Making capital both affordable and accessible to those with the drive and ideas to drive such change is key to the development of foreign economies and to the betterment of individuals' lives. Donor aid has its place, but business drives economies and buoys lives.
lender.occupational_info: I'm studying to become a doctor. Studying the law is a bit of a detour.

lender.name: Nicole
lender.loan_because: I've always loved the entrepreneurial spirit!
lender.occupational_info: My main duties are to assist, comfort and ensure the safety of people traveling on airplanes.

lender.name: dhanesh
lender.loan_because: I firmly believe entrepreneurship...

lender.name: Geoff
lender.loan_because: It feels good to be generous.
lender.occupational_info: I market and sell renewable energy to households.

lender.name: Sheryl
lender.loan_because: I have been very blessed in my life and I feel that this needs to be shared.
lender.occupational_info: Caring for and teaching children is very rewarding and is a joy.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: I would like to support hope and happiness. I would like to share my freedom with those who don't find freedom in their own current situation.
lender.occupational_info: I work for an international hotel company in the field of human resources.

lender.name: Elliot
lender.loan_because: I want the world to be a better place and to help the people of the world.

lender.name: Philipp
lender.loan_because: I like to help.

lender.name: Tammy
lender.loan_because: I can!!! I have been blessed with so many opportunities in my life, so now I can bless the lives of others in return.
lender.occupational_info: I teach nursery aged children (3-4 year olds) at the American School in Japan

lender.name: Olivero
lender.loan_because: You can't use an old map to find new land.
lender.occupational_info:
Whatever, a Belgium-based “intrapreneurial” company, provides a full range of tightly integrated services to information-hungry clients: workshops on searching the Web and building collective knowledge, consultancy on the safe and effective use of IT in the information era, and tools such as Knowledge Plaza, a Web-based platform that assists knowledge professionals in searching, managing, and sharing information.
123Generiques is a multi-faceted biopharmaceutical project in West Africa regrouping cultures of Artemisia annua plants (in collaboration with the UCL laboratory of pharmacognosy), a drug distribution platform and the set up of a generic pharmaceutical company.
http://www.linkedin.com/in/olivierverbeke

lender.name: Cortney
lender.loan_because: I love paying it forward!
lender.occupational_info: I am a chef who runs a very busy catering company and trains student chefs.

lender.name: jodie
lender.loan_because: I feel a sense of satisfaction knowing that my small contribution is helping others.
lender.occupational_info: I do all the invoicing for a freight forwarding company.

lender.name: Jeffrey
lender.loan_because: I want to help people empower themselves and give something back at the same time.

lender.name: Patricia & Jarod
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people a chance to work towards improving themselves and the world.

lender.name: Catherine
lender.loan_because: I feel very fortunate with the life I have been born into and would li ke to give something back.
lender.occupational_info: Caring for and raising three beautiful children.

lender.name: Verna
lender.loan_because: Kiva is an incredible way to make a difference. I made my first loan and I was hooked!
lender.occupational_info: I'm a medical coder for a hospital.

lender.name: Piotr
lender.loan_because: I'd like to help people in their life. It does not cost me to much to help other people.
lender.occupational_info: IT Specialist in Banking industry. Owner ISP company.

lender.name: Fran
lender.loan_because: I like to help people in other countries who don't always have the opportunities that most of us do in the western world. Hard working people who need some help to get them started in their selected businesses is very encouraging to see.
lender.occupational_info: I am a casual nurse and also a property investor on the Gold Coast of Queensland, Australia.

lender.name: jessica
lender.loan_because: its important to give an opportunity to someone who wants it.

lender.name: Tristan
lender.loan_because: I believe in enabling people to make their lives better everywhere in the world.

lender.name: Elijah
lender.loan_because: I have access to capital. It seems only fair.
lender.occupational_info: architect

lender.name: Christine
lender.occupational_info: I work as a paralegal in a law office in the United States.

lender.name: Mike
lender.loan_because: It's a way I can help people succeed on their own.

lender.name: Giancarlo
lender.loan_because: I love the loan idea because it means that genuine people in third world countries have a chance to move forward, it's not just a hand out like most charities.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an electrician installing commercial equipment in laundries. I work for a large American company.

lender.name: Melissa
lender.loan_because: As a Christian I feel it is important to help those who may have less material assets than me and this is a great way to help others around the world.

lender.name: Ellie
lender.loan_because: She needed help and it is kind to help other people. It also feels good.

lender.name: Leigh & Dan
lender.loan_because: We wish to give to those who demonstrate the drive and ambition to improve the quality of their own lives, as well as their community. We give this money in the name of Jesus Christ, who has given us the greatest gift.

lender.name: John
lender.loan_because: So the mechanic can fix more cars. I like cars, too. I hope he makes a NASCAR.

lender.name: Dina
lender.loan_because: We are so blessed in the US. I feel that to much is given much is expected and I want to share and bless others.
lender.occupational_info: I am fortunate enough to be able to stay home and raise 3 wonderful children. I also homeschool my children which means I am their teacher and we do school at home.

lender.name: Naoo
lender.loan_because: my daughter already a member of Kiva.

lender.name: Paonia Colorado
lender.loan_because: Energy must flow
lender.occupational_info: Service

lender.name: Sitaram
lender.loan_because: Success has nothing to do with what you gain in life or accomplish for yourself. It's what you do for others (famous quote from Danny Thomas).

lender.name: Trysteen
lender.loan_because: I am a citizen of this world who sees the urgency of needing to reach out to help others. There is no greater reward above that which lies in the simple act of giving.
lender.occupational_info: I am in the profession of raising awareness about all facets of life and living in every crevice of this world.

lender.name: Nishi
lender.loan_because: It is a great way to help those in need.
lender.occupational_info: I work in a Bank which is really not that exciting.

lender.name: Travis
lender.loan_because: People with ambition and creativity deserve a chance. I love to see what people can achieve when they're motivated to improve things.
lender.occupational_info: I make documentaries for television. I have also been an actor for many years in theater and independent film.

lender.name: Rick & Sue
lender.loan_because: we recognize how very lucky we are and this is the best way we've found to make a small contribution that could have a big impact.
lender.occupational_info: We are learning to invest in real estate and trade equities (stocks) and foreign exchange. If we are good students, we'll become wealthy. Then our families will be well provided for, and we can begin to make bigger contributions.

lender.name: Ian & Pauline
lender.loan_because: We think that our loan will help someone to inprove their lot in life.
lender.occupational_info: Our business sells stockfeed & fodder to local farmers.

lender.name: Regine
lender.loan_because: I want to help people to start an independent life

lender.name: Lila
lender.occupational_info: I am a student in school.

lender.name: samantha
lender.loan_because: I have travelled to Africa and seen how hard women work for their families and I would like to help them start their own business.
lender.occupational_info: imports and exports of cargo

lender.name: chandru
lender.loan_because: i would like the world to be a better place, the Lord has given us so much if we can just give a little back to his children it makes me feel very happy
lender.occupational_info: i am a manager of a sales organization dealing in diffrent products

lender.name: Stig
lender.loan_because: Enable people without normal banking capability to start their own business and provide for themselves and their family.
lender.occupational_info: I work as an entrepeneur with my own company, where we do investments and various projects within the energy sector.

lender.name: McDermott Family
lender.loan_because: If everyone did the same we would greatly reduce poverty.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of our children and the household.

lender.name: Anita
lender.loan_because: Kiva is such a brilliant idea, I felt like I had to get involved.

lender.name: helen
lender.loan_because: The good Lord has bountifully blessed me and my family. I applaud people who are prepared to 'have-a-go' and better themselves & opportunities for their families.
lender.occupational_info: I teach mainly 4 year olds at a Kindergarten. I believe in empowering children to 'have-a-go', persist & master new skills thereby enabling them to gain positive dispositions to become lifelong learners - able to successfully live in a world that we cant even imagine.

lender.name: Albert and Tarien
lender.loan_because: We want to give something back to those who are less fortunate and we think this is an fantastic idea to help people and families to help themselves, to support them in a way which lift them up that and improves their families lives!

lender.name: vicki
lender.loan_because: I was once a single mum struggling to get by and now i am able to give something back and hopefully my small donation can help someone else achieve their dream.
lender.occupational_info: I work with children ages ranging from 6mths old to school age, very enjoyable..

lender.name: Ralph
lender.loan_because: we are all connected to eachother; I have arrived at a certain understanding that there is no you. there is only we.
lender.occupational_info: transformation of consciousness

lender.name: Seamus
lender.loan_because: I can ... and so I should.

lender.name: Gregory
lender.loan_because: I have met some wonderful people from many different cultures and would like to support people prepared to have a go.
lender.occupational_info: I am responsible for the financial management of local government on the beautiful island of Tasmania.

lender.name: SSU Rotaract
lender.loan_because: Our focus is on serving in our local, national and international communities. Every little bit we do is a huge help to others. Join us!
lender.occupational_info: SSU Rotaract is a Community Service club on the Sonoma State University campus in beautiful Northern California.

lender.name: Susanne
lender.loan_because: I like to share what I have
lender.occupational_info: i try to attend and help people in difficult circumstances.

lender.name: Glenno
lender.loan_because: I live by the saying "More to all and less to none"

lender.name: Sibelle
lender.loan_because: I was and am in the same boat- No money, starting my life all over again, a good idea for a small business but absolutely zero support (and this in the so called first world)- Even the business founder bank and my own bank who know my clean record over the last 25 years said: 'The sum you need is too small'. Well dammit, i did it anyway, selling personal affairs and with some people who trusted in me and gave me goods on credit (their trust was rewarded and everything paid within the month) and a hell of a lot of work day and night i got it up and running- And I know it's the same for all those people all over the world. The work needed and courage to continue, how important it is for not just your own future but a nations overall economic welfare that people can go and do something, start businesses from scratch - It's the thousands of little busily whizzing wheels of these entepreneurs that make a country GO with a capital G. What better way to use even the small amounts of profit I am making now, than reinvest them in these humans all over the globe! I wish them the best of luck and.. do what i can, practically , to help make it happen. Hope you will jump on the train and invest a little income in people, not stock shares- this is the global stock of the future. Thanks xx
lender.occupational_info: Ouff, multi tasking is the word! I design logos and websites, write and translate texts, but also breed, buy and trade exotic winterhardy plants (Palm trees and bamboo for exmaple) With the money generated, i try to keep on working as an atist (I also write , do photography and paint) and reinvest some in projects which encourage native plants and nature ( my organisation is a member of greenpeace & Öomraan feriaan (Nature Protction and educative excursions for a Wadden Sea island) and donates every month, to name just one) well, and kiva of course!

lender.name: KAORU
lender.loan_because: I'm a lucky and like to make an effort to correspond to it.

lender.name: Lisa
lender.loan_because: I know how hard it is to start a small business and one cannot survive without the support of community, be it local or global. I am blessed to have the support of family and community. As a responsible global citizen, I am proud to give back to the community and thrilled to have this opportunity to help a visionary realize their goal of starting or expanding their small business.
lender.occupational_info: I work as a Virtual Assistant. I provide secretarial services to small businesses who either cannot afford to hire a full-time assistant, or have the space and equipment available. It is a very cost-effective option as the small business only pays for services rendered. May I say it is an eco-friendly career. I think I fill up the tank in my car about once a month instead of twice weekly when I worked for a big company!

lender.name: Fred & Jametta
lender.loan_because: This is a great way to help people while letting them be independent.

lender.name: Michael
lender.loan_because: its the right thing to do. We are called to help one another

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: I was given a gift certificate for my birthday and I think this way of helping developing countries makes alot of sense.
lender.occupational_info: I put together a community newspaper which shares community stories with the community. I also help a wind ensemble manage their concerts and rehearsals.

lender.name: In Memoriam
lender.loan_because:
In Memory of members of my immediate family who have passed away :
Father [November 2, 1900, Curacao, NA to November 1, 1972, Montreal, Quebec],
Mother [Sept 22,1906 ~ Nijmegen, The Netherlands to July 14, 2008 ~ Quebec, Canada] and
Eldest brother [October 5,1932, Curacao, NA -September 24, 2008, Montreal, Quebec] .
May they rest in peace.
Borrowers in these Developing Nations are above all human beings who need others to believe in them, to help them to believe in themselves and to assist them, from time to time, along their journey.
"The greatest glory in living lies not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall." - Nelson Mandela

lender.name: Renee
lender.loan_because: It is a good stimulation for (starting) businesses and it helps out people who otherwise could not get a loan.
lender.occupational_info:
I used to work in the graphic industry, together with a team we made weekly newspapers. A few of the things I did where: creating/changing advertisements and helping on the layout of pages (the way a page looks).
In my spare time I like to read, browse the internet, listen to music and work on websites.

lender.name: Arnt Jostein
lender.loan_because: This seems like a very good way to help other people

lender.name: Steve
lender.loan_because: We are all connected and all riding this amazing planet together. Sharing is essential for our world family to thrive.

lender.name: Martina
lender.loan_because: it takes so little to make a difference

lender.name: Kemp Family of Larkspur
lender.loan_because:
Give someone a fish and you feed him/her for a day; teach a someone to fish and you feed him/her for a lifetime.
. Knowledge is the best charity . to learn a lesson is a far better reward than to win a prize early in the GAME . it is better to know how to help yourself than to beg from others

lender.name: Laszlo
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.

lender.name: Joy
lender.loan_because: the word says that we will be lenders to nations and not borrowers. The thought of helping someone makes life meaningful.
lender.occupational_info: I do route accounting and workman's compensation for our office in Charlotte, NC. I work in the textile industry.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: it makes so much sense.

lender.name: Imaginations Ink
lender.loan_because: "We make a living by what we get, but we make a life by what we give." - Winston Churchill
lender.occupational_info: The focus of our work thus far has been two fold. Our first and main objective is to promote cultural transmission through film in hopes of fostering a better understanding of human life and it's many complexities. Secondly, as we believe that we as humans will always be inseparably connected to the Earth, our goal is to illustrate environmental issues worldwide and the human toll that accompanies them.

lender.name: Anna
lender.loan_because: This is the most incredible way to give thanks for the blessings and abundance that fills my life. I am so happy to help my sisters around the world rise up and live abundantly.

lender.name: Yung Joo
lender.loan_because: We share this small planet.

lender.name: Robert
lender.loan_because: I've been an entrepreneur for 30 years and want to help support others in developing nations.
lender.occupational_info: We Develop Innovative Technology Solutions for the World Trade Community.

lender.name: Christine
lender.loan_because: Be the change you wish to see in the world. ~ Gandhi

lender.name: Deni
lender.loan_because: Mohammad Yunus, Grameen Bank, is one of my favorite leaders in this world. He proved that microfinance works to help people lift themselves out of poverty. I am happy to have the opportunity to be a part of that process in someones life.
lender.occupational_info: Right now I am working temporary jobs as an administrative assistant to support myself as I attend college. The positions I work require basic secretarial and accounting skills.

lender.name: Julia
lender.loan_because: I enjoying helping people who are striving to live a productive life.
lender.occupational_info: I work with middle school students to help them learn how to solve problems they may be experiencing.

lender.name: Ellen & Alan
lender.loan_because: We were given a Kiva credit as a wedding gift. What a wonderful present! We are thrilled that our happiness has become a way to help others around the world.

lender.name: Matt & Jane
lender.loan_because: It feels good to make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I sit at a computer, writing software most of the day.

lender.name: Barbara
lender.loan_because: I want to help other women establish themselves in business so they are able to support their families.
lender.occupational_info: I sell broadcast air time--radio commercials.

lender.name: Sana
lender.loan_because: I want to grow up in a world where people will have the same opportunities I do.

lender.name: Lannie
lender.loan_because: because something so simple can do so much.

lender.name: Eagle Wings Church
lender.loan_because: It is the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: Our statement of purpose is to grow together in Christ through worship, fellowship and service.

lender.name: Chad Anderson
lender.loan_because: Through my travels to southern India (Tsunami Zone), Mexico, DR, and North Africa, I have come to realize how much our fellow human beings in developing countries need encouragement, hope, support, and to understand how much they truly matter. I strongly believe that if we all do our small part to help others in need, together we can make this world a better place!
lender.occupational_info: Pricing Analyst & Project Manager - At Better World Books, we are committed to helping provide better lives and a chance for economic, social and political freedom through literacy. We believe that good education can break the cycle of poverty. And that's why we partner with these passionate non-profit partners to make some change for the better.

lender.name: Natalie
lender.loan_because: "Freely you have received, freely give" (Matthew 10:8)

lender.name: Andrea
lender.occupation: Program Director in an after-school care program

lender.name: Pedro
lender.loan_because: I believe that a small aid can make a huge change in somebody's life

lender.name: Suzanne
lender.whereabouts: Tweed Heads South New South Wales

lender.name: Cassie
lender.loan_because: I believe in giving people less fortunate than myself a helping hand.
lender.occupational_info: I am studying to become a high school teacher.

lender.name: Mark
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Wendy
lender.loan_because: We loan to try and make a difference.
lender.occupational_info: I take care of my family. I have 5 children

lender.name: Greg
lender.loan_because: I believe the best way to make a difference is to help people help themselves.

lender.name: Chuck & Lana
lender.loan_because: We want to help others

lender.name: HKM
lender.loan_because: I want people everywhere to take part in the improvement of their lives.
lender.occupational_info: I help Canadian corporations in their corporate social responsibility (environmental and social) programs.

lender.name: Laurel
lender.loan_because: I can.

lender.name: Hayley
lender.loan_because: I live in a very fortunate country and believe that by helping others i can in a small way make the world a better place.

lender.name: Andrea
lender.loan_because: Everybody deserves a chance to improve their quality of life.
lender.occupational_info: I'm a freelance English to Spanish translator with a penchant for medical subjects.

lender.name: Heather
lender.loan_because: I was alerted to Kiva via my daughter and thought it was a great way to make a difference
lender.occupational_info: I run the day to day operation of a law firm.

lender.name: Alex
lender.loan_because: I feel lucky to be able to help. And, it's so easy!

lender.name: Ken and Kathy
lender.loan_because: We are all one on this beautiful planet and we are grateful that we can help our neighbors!

lender.name: Susan
lender.loan_because: A small amount of help can make a big difference in someone's life. If we are in a position to give even that small bit of help, we should. Together our efforts can change the world - KIVA is the proof.

lender.name: Jennifer
lender.loan_because: I live in a country where I have had wonderful opportunities given to me by wonderful people. I want to do the same for others!
lender.occupational_info: I assist those who are in danger of losing their homes. It is my job to try and help them keep them.

lender.name: Jessica
lender.loan_because: it's needed.

lender.name: Abel
lender.loan_because: I am very blessed and I realize that $25 is really nothing to me. But to someone who wants to and is willing to work hard, it is an opportunity to succeed and better themselves.

lender.name: Gemma
lender.loan_because: I feel I am so privileged in my life that I should try and help others as much as possible.
lender.occupational_info: I am a student working hard to get my journalism degree

lender.name: Ekkehard
lender.loan_because: I believe this to be a powerful tool to help people in need. And - let's be honest - a few dollars are not a big sacrifice. Yet they can help make somebody's dreams come true in other regions of the planet we share.
lender.occupational_info: Married, two sons. Managing Director of an advertising agency in Munich, Germany. We provide business-to-business communication, i.e. Corporate Identities, web marketing, direct mailings, consutling and training of communication issues.

lender.name: Vikram
lender.loan_because: I believe in the ventures of all the entrepreneurs here and their drive towards self-sustainability.

lender.name: Peter
lender.loan_because: It only takes a small loan and a great community to make a world of difference to someone. This is a wonderful idea and I intend to contribute what I can to help others.

lender.name: Kristin
lender.loan_because: I'd love to be able to say that I'm doing thing simply because I think it's a great way to help people build a better life for themselves and their families, and that really is a very big part of it. But it's also because after having been homebound and disabled for about a decade, I don't often get to feel like I'm actually doing anything to try and change things for the better - like I don't have a purpose in being here. I know it's kind of selfish to be motivated to do something because it makes *you* feel better, but I have to admit that, for me, that's part of it.

lender.loan_because: I can.
lender.occupational_info: I work to sell and transport natural gas to companies that use it to power their building and machines.

lender.name: Nick
lender.loan_because: every person deserves a chance to prosper and grow.
lender.occupational_info: In this day and age there is no reason why anyone should not be informed of what is happening throughout the world. I want to make sure that just because I live in an established country, other people in less fortunate countries have a chance to be happy.

lender.name: john
lender.loan_because: I enjoy helping people make their own dreams a reality.
lender.occupational_info: I build custom cabinets for homes

lender.name: Stephanie
lender.loan_because: I can

lender.name: Larry
lender.loan_because: It's the right thing to do.
lender.occupational_info: I am a pilot, flying the Cessna Citation Sovereign business jet. We fly movie stars, politicians, business people and wealthy families around the world.

lender.name: Jody
lender.loan_because: We're all one--by giving and lifting them up, I also open up my ability to continue the cycle of giving and receiving.
lender.occupational_info: I empower people and streamline businesses and lives. Helping people to become more conscious of who they are, then aligning who they are with their world in the personal lives and business through systems and communication.

lender.name: Linda
lender.loan_because: This is something I believe the good Lord would want me to do...to help those who are less fortunate than myself. We need to make a difference in this world, and I think this is a great way to show how much we really do care about others.
lender.occupational_info: I use to work with the mentally retarded for 23 yrs, but I got injured at work in late 2006, and I'm no longer able to work. I loved working with them, and helping them learn in how to be more independent with themselves. I miss them dearly, but I take with me the compassion and love I received from them in return.

lender.name: Mary
lender.loan_because: We are so fortunate in North America and I feel it is our responsibility to help less fortunate people in other countries.

lender.name: Jeff
lender.loan_because: I was once poor also.
lender.occupational_info: I work with computers in a business office.
